dm

public java.util.Map<OpWsdlPathScore_type,OpWsdlPathScore_type> dm(java.util.List<OpWsdl> workflowOPs,

given workflow operation, and candidate operation compare the output of the last operation in the workflow with the input of the candidate operation return a map[node&scoreOfinput, node&scoreOfoutput] to reuse the OpWsdlPathScore_type, node is presented as a list(path) with one node
